data.system_settings: Asus 2-in-1 PC Transformer book T100TA Windows 10 Home 32-bit, x64-based processor
data.expected_result: The app should restore down like other apps
data.short_description: Can't restore down with the finger (**Happens only with Touchscreen devices**)
